mapper.select:
select a.id, a.name, a.financing_quota "financingQuota", used_quota "usedQuota", usable_quota "usableQuota" , a.financing_proportion "financingProportion" , a.financing_mode "financingMode" ,b.value AS "financingModeName" from lease_car_buy_financinger a LEFT JOIN lease_dict b on a.financing_mode = b.id and b.type = 'FinancingMode' WHERE 1=1
and name like concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
